name: Abi Sarra
body: This is a great product, used for a long time, no complaint at all, enjoyed it!

name: Silux pizara
body: Sounds so clear and sharp view, performance was great, gaming experience was amazing

name: Karim Banzeema
body: One of the trending tech in this generation. VR makes feel to adjust with virtual reality.

name: Abid khan
body: If you're looking for a completely immersive virtual reality experience for gaming or working out, then VR headsets are absolutely worth the money. You don't even have to be a hardcore gamer to get the most out of your headset.

name: Ariza Parish
body: The incredible thing about the technology is that you feel like you're actually present in another place with other people. People who try it say it's different from anything they've ever experienced in their lives.

name: Kimi Lame
body: While VR headsets may cause concerns about potential harm to our vision, they also can help people enhance their vision. Under the guidance of an eye care professional, a VR headset can be used to improve eye coordination, hand-eye coordination, depth perception and reaction time
